attributes.action: Support the Howard League for Penal Reform campaign to improve the care for children in the penal system by recognising the child behing the crime, improving access to justice for children, and making sure every child has a safe home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Howard League for Penal Reform legal team has represented hundreds of troubled children in jail.  Our case files tell stories of abused and neglected children with chaotic families and problems from mental health to addiction.  To help them lead crime free and safe lives, the charity is campaigning for the children to have a safe home, a fair hearing and the best chance in life.
